text: Arizona Dream is a 1993 French-American surrealist indie comedy drama movie co-written and directed by Emir Kusturica. It stars Johnny Depp, Jerry Lewis, Faye Dunaway, Lili Taylor and Vincent Gallo. This movie was filmed in Arizona in 1991. The movie won the Silver Bear - Special Jury Prize at the 43rd Berlin International Film Festival. ==References== Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1990s American drama movies Category:1993 comedy-drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Emir Kusturica
title: Arizona Dream
